<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.AWAQueueAverageWaitTimeExtPointImpl</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Implements extension point global.AWAQueueAverageWaitTimeExtPoint for calculating the average wait time for a queue. If an active implementation is provided, the result of calculateAverageWaitTimeForQueue will be used instead of the default implementation that averages the last 20 accepted work items.  If a result of 0 (or lower) is returned, the queue will not be updated.</description> <name>AWAQueueAverageWaitTimeExtPointImpl</name> <script><![CDATA[var AWAQueueAverageWaitTimeExtPointImpl = Class.create(); AWAQueueAverageWaitTimeExtPointImpl.prototype = { initialize: function() { },
/** * return the queue average wait time, in milliseconds */ calculateAverageWaitTimeForQueue: function(queueID) { return 0; },
type: 'AWAQueueAverageWaitTimeExtPointImpl' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-10 09:33:36</sys_created_on> <sys_id>44ab0441732230104a905ee515f6a737</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AWAQueueAverageWaitTimeExtPointImpl</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Advanced Work Assignment" source="com.glide.awa">d13c46ab47664210cd4e1ce4316d4391</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_44ab0441732230104a905ee515f6a737</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-10 11:26:47</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
